If that target should be KO'd in battle before the effect expires, 30% of your maximum HP and MP will be restored. →29124Grants self a beneficial effect based on the selected party member or enemy. If target is a DPS, grants <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>Junction DPS<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>. If target is a tank, or if no target is selected, grants <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>Junction Tank<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>. If target is a healer, grants <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>Junction Healer<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>. <UIForeground>F201F8</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F9</UIGlow>Additional Effect: <UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>Grants <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>Powder Barrel<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> when targeting an enemy <UIForeground>F201F8</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F9</UIGlow>Duration: <UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>10s ※<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Solid Barrel Combo<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> changes to <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Burst Strike<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> while under the effect of <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>Powder Barrel<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.→Reduces the potency of target's attacks and healing potency by 25%. <UIForeground>F201F8</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F9</UIGlow>Duration: <UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>6s <UIForeground>F201F8</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F9</UIGlow>Additional Effect: <UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>Grants <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>Powder Barrel<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> <UIForeground>F201F8</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F9</UIGlow>Duration: <UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>10s ※<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Solid Barrel Combo<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> changes to <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Burst Strike<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> while under the effect of <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>Powder Barrel<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.

29498
29499Delivers an attack with a potency of 16,000 to all nearby enemies.
